option.name: originalContent
option.value:
# fly.toml app configuration file generated for cashie-backend on 2025-07-30T05:47:09Z # # See https://fly.io/docs/reference/configuration/ for information about how to use this file. #
app = 'cashie-backend' primary_region = 'cdg'
[build]
[http_service] internal_port = 8080 force_https = true auto_stop_machines = false auto_start_machines = true min_machines_running = 0 processes = ['app']
[[vm]] memory = '1gb' cpu_kind = 'shared' cpus = 1 memory_mb = 1024

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# fly.toml app configuration file generated for cashie-backend on 2025-07-30T05:47:09Z # # See https://fly.io/docs/reference/configuration/ for information about how to use this file. #
app = 'cashie-backend' primary_region = 'cdg'
[build] dockerfile = "Dockerfile"
[http_service] internal_port = 8080 force_https = true auto_stop_machines = false auto_start_machines = true min_machines_running = 0 processes = ['app']
[[vm]] memory = '1gb' cpu_kind = 'shared' cpus = 1 memory_mb = 1024
